channel.title: King Black Dragon problem
channel.description:
Hello every1 i have a problem with KBD, he only attacks with melee so does some1 know how to make him attack with melee and mage or a guide?? Same to tormented demons. Its a PI source.
Thanks for the help.

item.title: King Black Dragon problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Here’s kbd’s ice breath: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/265440-pi-king-black-dragon-ice-breath.html

item.title: King Black Dragon problem
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

well in delta we have a npchandler.java
and in that we have the anit-fire shield where it blows its breath and stuff, so heres what my code for kbd looks like

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50 && misc.random(3)==1){ if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 2621 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 15185 || plr.ProtMage) { plr.lowGFX(579, 0); hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(7); plr.sM("You are protected from the dragon's fire!"); } else if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 1540 && plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 2621 && plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 15185) { plr.lowGFX(579, 0); hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(30); plr.sM("You are burnt by the fire!");}

try to find something similar and look for something like this

but the 50 is kbd so you might want to look up green dragons and just see what you can do

Read full topic
